abstract: The company said Tuesday that it would like to build a $1 billion floating terminal for liquefied natural gas about 20 miles off the coast of New Jersey.
snippet: The company said Tuesday that it would like to build a $1 billion floating terminal for liquefied natural gas about 20 miles off the coast of New Jersey.
lead_paragraph: Exxon Mobil said Tuesday that it would like to build a $1 billion floating terminal for liquefied natural gas about 20 miles off the coast of New Jersey, a move meant to deflect safety and environmental concerns about proximity to populated areas.

headline.main: Wary of Protests, Exxon Plans Natural Gas Terminal in the Atlantic
headline.print_headline: Wary of Protests, Exxon Plans Natural Gas Terminal in the Atlantic
